column4: i want to format my HD, i have a number of partions on 1 HD, so i just execute this command in my terminal? "dd if=/dev/zero of=/dev/hda" Im running linux Desktop edition btw
that will erase the entire hard disk with zeros. all partitions, all data, boot blocks, partition tables, everything.
in theory bad sectors are disabled by the drive itself, but there's also a "badblocks" tool that can scan for them
